00028 /**********************************error.h*************************************
00029 Function: error_msg_fatal()
00030 
00031 Input : formatted string and arguments.
00032 Output: conversion printed to stdout.
00033 Return: na.
00034 Description: prints error message and terminates program.
00035 Usage: error_msg_fatal("this is my %d'st test",test_num)
00036 **********************************error.h*************************************/
00037 extern void error_msg_fatal(char *msg, ...);
